showChart

public static void showChart(android.content.Context context,
                             Device device,
                             java.lang.String yTitle,
                             ChartSeriesDescription... seriesDescriptions)
Goes to the charting activity.

Parameters:
context - calling intent
device - concerned device
yTitle - description of the values (only one!)
seriesDescriptions - series descriptions each representing one series in the resulting chart
